website_summaries.verdict: The best stereo and infotainment system upgrade package that Boss has to offer. Comes with a remote control and backup camera.
pros: The 6.2-inch touchscreen display automatically works with the included backup camera to provide a clear image of the vehicle's rear area
Navigation system is easy to set up and use before major trips or commutes
cons: Navigation maps lack reliable real-time weather and traffic alerts

website_summaries.verdict: The best budget in-dash DVD player for people wanting basic playback and music functionality.
pros: One of the few budget options that actually comes with navigation
Includes a separate backup camera for older vehicles
Bluetooth-compatibility makes it easy to connect a phone
cons: Can be difficult to install and wire up the backup camera without professional service or help

customer_reviews.title: Love everything about it except for the EQ
customer_reviews.text: Love everything about it except for the EQ. I wish we had the option for an EQ and just plain old Bass/Treble settings. Bass/Treble is all you need, the EQ is impossible to tune just right. And if one setting sounds good for radio it doesn't sound good for a CD or USB. If you put a custom screen background image this will cause it take longer to boot up and turn on when you start your car. Also weird fact, you cannot adjust volume while the backup camera is on the display.
customer_reviews.author: DaByuBoy

customer_reviews.title: I would like to exchange for another unit
customer_reviews.text: I cannot program any settings. The radio portion does not work, The backup camera does not work. All it does is boot up, goes to the radio. I go to the setup option but cannot change any thing. I bought this unit to go into my RV, and had to wait to install it because the RV was being worked on. I would like to exchange for another unit.
customer_reviews.author: W C Bradford

customer_reviews.title: First let me qualify myself. I'm a retired master ...
customer_reviews.text: First let me qualify myself. I'm a retired master auto mechanic with a strong background in advanced automotive control systems. That said, this install is no "cake walk". Too much information on wire description and operation of the unit is abbreviated or not defined. Open the user manual and go to the wiring page to see for yourself. My wife knows nearly nothing about auto technology but helps me through software operation and we've about worn the manual out trying to figure out how to operate this unit. I see no other manual available online. Other than that the unit works as is should but the fact that is does not have voice to command can be a pain.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Blew in only 2 weeks wtf!?!? No warning either
customer_reviews.text: Don’t waste your money! Only gave one star because I had too they deserve 0 stars! Deck blow out in two weeks after professional installation. I spent more money installing an uninstalling this piece of junk than it’s worth and there customer service would not even throw me speakers or anything for all the money I had to waste on there junk. They of course wouldn’t help with install fees so since I got no help from Boss I returned it back to amazon prime. Thank you amazon! But what ever you do don’t buy Boss I used to be a loyal customer of theirs for years with speakers but the radios are junk!
customer_reviews.author: Becky

customer_reviews.title: Spend the $100 and buy a name brand
customer_reviews.text: I’ve since replaced this with a Pioneer deck that I should have bought in the first place. Sound quality is bad worse than factory. Impossible to retain steering wheel controls, I’ve tried multiple add ons none work with boss brand. The most frustrating part is that the Bluetooth decides to connect with my phone all the time and the only way to get it to stop is to pull over and turn off the car then restart it. DVD player and CD player skip on cd/dvd that play perfectly in other cars/players Waste of money
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Stereo looks and work very good.
customer_reviews.text: I waited before I did this review cause the first one I ordered had a problem No Sound. It is pretty easy to install. Both Amazon and the seller stepped up and got me a replacement unit in just a few days that's why I give it 5 stars. Great customers service thank you both !! the stereo looks and sounds very good in my 2012 GMC Sierra SLE. Very easy set up too and the GPS works well. Hope to get quite a few years out of this system. Oh have not connected the camera cause I don't need it that's why no camera rating. Nice stereo overall !!!
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: GPS back again, a blessing for someone who always manages to get lost.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this radio to replace a single DIN unit, because I needed the GPS function since my separate GPS unit went south (broke). I am very pleased with this radio, the sound it produced, compared to a rather expensive single DIN radio that it replaced, is absolutely astonishing. The install was straight forward since I have no need to watch DVD's on it, even though it will play them, I did not enable that function. The setup of the radio was also very easy, and the 10-band equalizer it has was another surprise, and a welcome one at that. It sounds absolutely HIGH END!!
customer_reviews.author: Frank Von Furstenrecht

customer_reviews.title: This perfect for my jaguar stype 2003
customer_reviews.text: So far so good !!!i love this infotainment. I had it installed to my 2003 jaguar s type a week ago and the final result came out nicely. I bought extra items that go with this and everything works perfectly! The camera is clear even at night, the music is amazing .the only complain i have is the navigation.i think the gps is outdated coz it won't recognize or cant find my home address.. LMAO. probably bcoz our house was built 2 years ago and the whole area is pretty new too..so mybe the gps needed updating but its worth it !
customer_reviews.author: alessa a.

customer_reviews.title: Bluetooth and GPS problems.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my high school-aged son solely for the Bluetooth (hands free talk) connection and the back-up camera. The camera and screen have been fine, however the Bluetooth will not turn on. The toggle switch will not move to enable it, and I have been unable to find a fix. Also, the GPS is stuck in Washington, D.C. and will not update to our location. The volume control was either off or extremely loud upon installation and I had to mess with the equalization for a long time to get it balanced. I would appreciate any ideas or recommendations on the Bluetooth and GPS issues.
customer_reviews.author: Tessa Krueger

customer_reviews.title: Great unit
customer_reviews.text: This thing is awesome does it all. Installed in 2hrs. Bypassed the brake switch for the dvd. Easy. I will be adding the backup camera. Bluetooth and nav are great. Couldn't ask for more
customer_reviews.author: kenny

customer_reviews.title: Don't expect any sort of technical support.
customer_reviews.text: I contacted technical support because the unit would not sort or find songs on a SD card. They were unable to tell me; what version of ID3 it used, what file structure it used, or any other technical information about it. Their best advise was try "this" and see if it works, if not try "something else". If those don't work we don't know what to tell you. It seems like Boss Audio Systems is a distributor and not a manufacturer. They put their name on a product they buy and don't know anything about it. The user guide is evidence of that.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Decide yourself, it's nice but...
customer_reviews.text: Overall seems to be a good unit, was going to return but missed the deadline. Lots of features....BUT.... The brightness is dim at the highest setting cannot see display that good in daylight. The sound on the stereo itself is way too loud at the number 1 setting, even with the offsets in settings set to -6 you can't have a conversation without turning the sound completely off. Other than those 2 key feature issues, it's a pretty nice setup and works well, navigation is on point also.
customer_reviews.author: CJ J.

customer_reviews.title: It works.
customer_reviews.text: I installed it on my Honda Odyssey. It works great. I tested GPS Navigation, bluetooth pairing, USB MP3, DVD playing and even the steering wheel control. Everything works as it should be.
customer_reviews.author: igs

customer_reviews.title: Camera works like a champ
customer_reviews.text: Does everything it claims to do. GPS works really well. It connects to my phone every time. Camera works like a champ. My only reason for not giving it 5 stars is the sound. It just doesn't have a premium sound. It isn't bad, it just isn't what I thought it would be. The factory stereo actually seemed to sound a little better. For the money it is worth it with all the features it has.
customer_reviews.author: greg

customer_reviews.title: Better than any android unit!
customer_reviews.text: 4.0 out of 5 stars Worth the money but it will be 5 stars if maps updates were free. I just bough it to replace a Jensen unit and very happy nothing beats a physical volume button. Pro's: - Inexpensive with many features - Easy to install and menus are easy to use - Easy pairing - High resolution audio - Very quick and responsive Cons: - Navigation updates you have to pay for them.
customer_reviews.author: Pctech

customer_reviews.title: Boss Audio BV9384NV GPS Navigation
customer_reviews.text: First the included backup camera's resolution very clear. The sound quality is good, but, maybe I wont put all the blame on the head unit as some could be coming from my speakers! The Resolution on the GPS system is very bad, quite Grainy with shadows and not very distinctive! My overall rating should only be about Four Stars!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's only basic!!!!
customer_reviews.text: All I can say is navigation through this product is the only thing I can say that's good. The sound quality is ok but not top for adding more sounds bummer! Next the screen you definitely cannot see in any light! And most important.....the usb connection. Cant and Sony play anything that I've added to a expandable device(usb drive,memory stick.or even my expandable hard drive)nothing works no matter what format! Seriously!!!
customer_reviews.author: glenn murray

customer_reviews.title: Buy 2 in order to get all working parts....
customer_reviews.text: the first time I purchased this item the actual stereo smelled like burnt electronics. plugged everything up and no sound came out. so I returned it and received another one. the stereo worked perfect but the 2nd backup camera output was blurry and did not fix itself. also the navigation antenna stopped working 24 hours after I returned the original product. I recommend buying 2 of these to get all the correct working parts. I know none of you will do that so I highly recommend staying away from this product all together. it would be nice to contact the seller for a nav antenna replacement but there doesn't seem to be a way to contact them directly.
customer_reviews.author: Texan_dougie

customer_reviews.title: Went in a 1986 Chevy Blazer
customer_reviews.text: Since, the Blazer is much older and priced places like Car Toys for installation I was not getting the help I wanted from those places so I went to Amazon. If the car was newer I am sure I wouldn't have issues with installation, a lot of modification took place with my older Blazer. I thank YouTube for the help on tough questions with installation. I am thinking about replacing the stereo in the newer Suburban.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie

customer_reviews.title: You can take the chance if you like
customer_reviews.text: I wouldn’t buy this again. Went out on me in two days! Nothing more needs to be said but for the people that may need the info... when the system is working it’s a decent product and a great product for the price. Navigation is kinda slow but everything else works well. I don’t no if it’s the fuse in the back that made it go out or what but all I know is the system went out with my DVD in it so it’s lost forever lol
customer_reviews.author: Dina S.

customer_reviews.title: Bluetooth doesnt work on mine..
customer_reviews.text: It wont let me connect to my bluetooth. Itll connect for 10-15 minutes then it will completely stop playing anything from my phone and anyone else... I love the radio but the main reason I bought it, doesnt work on mine and when I called for support i was told to reconnect it and of course it reconnected and they said it was fine but 10 minutes later it disconnected. It happens with every phone I've tried to use.
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Touch Screen freezes
customer_reviews.text: I like the features that the product comes with, the DVD player, Bluetooth audio and calling system. However, I am somewhat disappointed with the product. The DVD player, radio and Bluetooth did not load on the system even though the product is turned on. the features only load on the system only after turn it on and off several times, which is frustrating at times. This started to occur after one day after the unit was installed in the car. I am so disappointed because I had the same problem with another unit that was installed in my car, and here I am experiencing the same problem all over again with a new unit. I want to return it
customer_reviews.author: Joel Samuels

customer_reviews.title: Great features at a great price
customer_reviews.text: Sound quality lacking. Doesn't have much power or bass. Tried changing speakers and still have same issues. Other features are really good and operate well. If you are looking for something affordable its good, but wouldn't recommend installing in a newer vehicle. Pros: Lots of features , affordable, has navigation Cons: Sound quality lacks power and bass. Navigation screen is too busy. Tried turning off features ...No Luck. Backup camera has a reminder banner at bottom screen ever time when camera is activated. "Watch out for objects while backing." Takes up some viewing area..can't seem to turn this feature off.
customer_reviews.author: Larry Sigmon

customer_reviews.title: MIC AND NAV SUCKS.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for the hands free, will the mic sucks! No one can really hear you, needs external mic in my opinion. Navigation sucks. Bad instructions and have to find info on you tube. (Especially on the camera installation) But other than that it works, sounds good.. I guess you get what you pay for. I would love the option to install an external mic.
customer_reviews.author: Mitx

customer_reviews.title: stopped working after 2 days
customer_reviews.text: I purchased as a present. It was installed worked perfect. GPS and all. Then 2 days later all that comes up is the display screen
customer_reviews.author: Bj

customer_reviews.title: Honda CR-V 2009 LX
customer_reviews.text: Fit perfectly on my Honda CR-V 2009 LX. With  and  IMPORTANT: You have to connect the Blue antenna adapter wire to the P. ANT. Blue wire on the BOSS unit.
customer_reviews.author: Zuken

customer_reviews.title: Felling conned.
customer_reviews.text: When I was looking for a radio I typed in Bose Radio. The a Boss radio popped up and I ordered it thinking it was a Bose. The play on words Bose / Boss made me feel like I had been conned. That is a bitter pill to swallow. I paid $250 to have the radio inshalled and every thing I ordered. And the quality doesn't match my Treverse LTZ. So I have a top of the line vehicle with a less then base sound system. At this point I just threw up my hands and took the loss. Wont do that one again.
customer_reviews.author: Keith Sullivan

customer_reviews.title: Poor FM reception.
customer_reviews.text: The first one would not power up properly about a 1/4 of the time. Had bad FM reception. The 2nd one works fine but still has bad reception. I really expected better from this then my 15 year old basic factory radio.
customer_reviews.author: BaldGuy

customer_reviews.title: Very impressive.  Perhaps an audiophile would not think so but to me very impressive works
customer_reviews.text: I drive an open car. The screen, here in New England, can be seen even in bright sunlight. Tuning is selective enough to pick up a low power FM station that is about 25 miles distant -- no other radio that I have used has been able to hold this particular station. The GPS antenna did not pick up the satellite when it was placed under the dash -- it works fine on the space in front of the trunk lid. This is my third knock off receiver and it is the best by far
customer_reviews.author: RGB888

customer_reviews.title: Awesome stereo!
customer_reviews.text: Not very good instructions and was not the easiest to install.. But we got it and it's perfect. Good quality camera and navigation is spot on. So many things to do and use it's kind of confusing at 1st. But I'm learning quickly.. Great quality and sound.. I'm impressed honestly!!
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Garbage
customer_reviews.text: Ugh. I paid money for this. Garbage, slow boot, slow back up camera initialization. Touch screen sucks, music file cant play half my downloaded music, touch screen keeps pick songs when I'm trying to scroll the list. Nav system slow, cant find any addresses I enter, doesnt show traffic (or anything useful).
customer_reviews.author: rick

customer_reviews.title: Took forever to arrive. Hooked it all up and ...
customer_reviews.text: Took forever to arrive . Hooked it all up and no sound . I guess that's what I get for buying a boss product and not getting something with a reputable name
customer_reviews.author: james hudson

customer_reviews.title: False advertisement
customer_reviews.text: Very nice radio that amazon indicated would fit my vehicle but after receiving it would not fit my 2000 Chevy Express 1500 van.
customer_reviews.author: Rookmaster

customer_reviews.title: Sound Blaster
customer_reviews.text: I’ve got the unit for about 3 months it has worked good, Navigation DVD CAMERA Bluetooth Touchscreen and didn’t spend a fortune, like other units cost, great product , easy install. Only downside camera cable not made for Super cab truck, too short.
customer_reviews.author: Angel

customer_reviews.title: Bought this radio and it's definitely a nice one with navigation etc
customer_reviews.text: Bought this radio and it's definitely a nice one with navigation etc. The only draw back for me was people couldn't hear me on the phone. After a few weeks I returned the radio. The microphones attached to the radio so you can't adjust the microphone closer to you or anything and that was a big draw back for me.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Dosent remember your bluetooth
customer_reviews.text: If you're playing through bluetooth and you turn the car off and back on it goes straight to the radio and comes on loud as all hell so just use an aux cable dosent remember to go back to bluetooth and when you go to bluetooth it wont play anything you have to switch to streaming everytime then the navigation antenna went out in about 3 weeks
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Buyer beware
customer_reviews.text: Order this for my daughter’s birthday in July had it installed for $170. First the GPS stopped working then the sound quality now it doesn’t work at all. No lights no nothing just doesn’t work a waste of my money and time do not buy. And of course my 30 day return period has passed how convenient. Now my daughter doesn’t have a radio at all going to have to pay more money to get a new one do not buy😡
customer_reviews.author: Walter

customer_reviews.title: Cannot Beat For the Price
customer_reviews.text: A great unit for the price. Got this for $176 and had it professionally installed. The backup camera is great and the navigation system works as it should. I have noticed that it could be updated but it also gives directions how to do so on the NDRIVE website. Streaming music, phone calls are work great. Built in equalizer is awesome and allows you to customize sound to your car. I have a 2015 Jeep Wrangler with sound bar and sub-woofer. This unit distributes the sound and it thumps. So far very impressed.
customer_reviews.author: Ronald A Plante

customer_reviews.title: 04 Suburban
customer_reviews.text: Has all the bells and whistles! Even came with the back up camera and all the wiring need to install. The sound could be better but you can't beat the price.
customer_reviews.author: roystd1

customer_reviews.title: I love how big the screen is for my GPS
customer_reviews.text: I love how big the screen is for my GPS. I can actually see it. The only problem I'm having is my blu tooth does not want to stay connected. I have no idea what's wrong. We can seem to pin point it. The other issue I dont like is the GPS attachment has to sit on my dashboard!
customer_reviews.author: Rich

customer_reviews.title: Not perfect fit
customer_reviews.text: Well it claims this is exact fir for my 2004 tahoe and its not. If that was case i should be able to unplug mibe and plug this in instead i have pay someone to take 4-5 hours to install.
customer_reviews.author: Jo

customer_reviews.title: GPS
customer_reviews.text: The GPS work fine but limited to route options, around my area its great but for long trips its not so good if you like taking other roads the toll ways. Went on a road trip from NY to IL and then to PA then home used my iPhone.
customer_reviews.author: Rluky3

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Bought this radio in May and within 6 months it started having problems. The left side speakers stopped working and the back-up camera went blank.
customer_reviews.author: Harold

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Works like advertised, fairly easy to install with the right plug and basil. The radio station numbers could be a little larger so they could be read from driver seat.
customer_reviews.author: johnnie johnson

customer_reviews.title: Decent stereo for great price
customer_reviews.text: Initial thoughts: I have installed this for just under a week, and it is awesome. Navigation works well, streaming works well, and so far everything is pretty good. Some cons: -always turns on radio, instead of defaulting to streaming from Bluetooth like I would want. -screen can be hard to read in direct sunlight Will follow up after a couple of weeks with unit
customer_reviews.author: Morgan Smart

customer_reviews.title: It sounds great with my speakers that I had installed
customer_reviews.text: I was worried that it wouldn't be how I wanted it to be. It sounds great with my speakers that I had installed. Only thing I do not like, it didn't have a place to connect to the steering wheel volume buttons and you cannot listen to music and use the camera or the navigation at the same time. Other than that it works great.
customer_reviews.author: Aylyn Cerda

customer_reviews.title: good competitive price and the features it comes with work ...
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Works as expected, good competitive price and the features it comes with work fine. Cons: The wiring diagram for power could do a better job of explaining what each wire does. YELLOW- (B+)12V RED - ACC(+12V) LT.GREEN - PARKING BRAKE VIOLETWHITE- REVERSE BLUE - ANT. CONT BLACK - GROUND BLUEWHITE - P.CONT
customer_reviews.author: EMT

customer_reviews.title: Cheap product, crappy quality... 2 times lasted less than a week each.
customer_reviews.text: Ordered, installed, gps antenna screw nipple broke off the back, amazon sent replacement, DVD player broke within a week and will no longer accept discs. The time spent installing and uninstalling and dealing with returns is far more expensive than the money saved by going cheap in buying this unit.... in this case, getting a deal was not a deal, it was just a cheap piece of junk that has cost me too much time.
customer_reviews.author: brian witty

customer_reviews.title: Cd/dvd failed after 1 year and half
customer_reviews.text: I was happy with ot until the cd/dvd player failed and nobody is able to fix it, the warranty has ended and impossible to contact the seller!
customer_reviews.author: maryline LEONARDI

customer_reviews.title: This is a very nice entertainment system for the money
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice entertainment system for the money. My only gripe is that it doesn't have a dimmer connection, so the screen brightness must be manually adjusted. Aside from that, excellent value and good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Reddtekk

customer_reviews.title: 123 and your bumpin down the street
customer_reviews.text: I’ve always liked boss audio because they make affordable and good quality stereos for cars and marine which I’m a boat mechanic. I had it installed in a couple hours only because I had to remove some plastic from behind the head unit so it would fit in my Buick. Love the themes and user interface. Thank you Boss Audio for staying consistent.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Gahan

customer_reviews.title: 👍
customer_reviews.text: For the price it’s a good set up it’s nice having Bluetooth hands free and gps in the dump truck
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: Radio burned out in 2 and 1/2 Weeks
customer_reviews.text: backup camera does not work perfect lot of static on camera. Radio sound quality excellent
customer_reviews.author: Danny D Gonzales

customer_reviews.title: works great
customer_reviews.text: Is a sweet radio was easy to install the kit had to do so trimming but all in all easy...
customer_reviews.author: JAMES MORET

customer_reviews.title: Reasonably priced with a lot of features.
customer_reviews.text: Easy installation with harnesses. I was able to get everything to work. Stereo sounds great. It has a lot of features. The best bang for your buck. I would definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: myla67

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: The sound is great BUT the Navigation really sucks and it does not support screen mirroring. Also the little door that covers aux/usb/sd inputs is very fragile and broke of as soon as I opened it. I would not suggest this to anyone. Spend the money on a better unit. Preferably one that supports screen mirroring so u can use Google Maps. And besides...u can't update the map card.
customer_reviews.author: Brian D.

customer_reviews.title: Good beginning for a better future
customer_reviews.text: I needed a better back up camera so I bought one with Abraham (the installer) much better quality and it can be set to different angles for $150. Good sound feeling experience with, GPS, radio, touch screen, pairing phone easy, remote and pen work pretty good specially for me that I don’t have steering wheel radio buttons. USB, Aux, SD ALL ports are there!
customer_reviews.author: zeir

customer_reviews.title: Do yourself a favor and spend the extra money on a better brand.
customer_reviews.text: This thing is garbage. The back up camera does not work automatically when shifting to reverse, even after wiring it correctly like it says to. The speaker phone is hard to hear and the microphone is tiny and far away from the driver. People can't hear unless you scream and you can't hear them over the hissing noise in the background. The navagation is cheap and not user friendly.
customer_reviews.author: gary miller

customer_reviews.title: Great look
customer_reviews.text: I was lead to believe that it came with tomtom navigation software. That was the deciding point on getting this. I am not dissatisfied with ndrive, but would be much more happy with tomtom. The rest of the stereo is awsome. Every works and looks great in mu truck. I will recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome love this stereo everything was an easy installation
customer_reviews.text: Awesome love this stereo everything was an easy installation. Great sound nice lighting plays sd card CD DVD over air stations nicely remote control fantastic. Only issue is GPS has to be updated and you have to pay extra
customer_reviews.author: Djsno80al

customer_reviews.title: Works great.
customer_reviews.text: Nice sound and a lot of features. Installation instructions are poor. The only things that keeps it at 4 star is the included camera is junky and the unit takes some time to boot up.
customer_reviews.author: Brett Higgins

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly better sound than expected for price
customer_reviews.text: Sound was much better then expected and everything works well
customer_reviews.author: DP

customer_reviews.title: Good for the Money
customer_reviews.text: Great budget buy. Only a few things as others have mentioned was the camera RCA cable is a little short. Directions very vague. Small volume button. Display is great and GPS seems to work well.
customer_reviews.author: Brett H

customer_reviews.title: I'm not quite sure about this unit.
customer_reviews.text: Today I had it installed by BestBuy. so far I do not like it. its suppose to be touchscreen and it seems like I have to use the stylus a lot. I know I will lose it and besides who wants to use a stylus in their car. I'm not quite sure about the Nav either. I'm still trying to figure out how to update it, so far I am not happy, thinking about returning it. I like the Bluetooth tho, but my main purpose of buying this was for the Nav.
customer_reviews.author: M Gray

customer_reviews.title: Slow!!
customer_reviews.text: Ooohhh well this sucks!!takes time to pick up the GPS very slow!!! The screen not easy see the day light and also it's hard to type in the address.
customer_reviews.author: Miselle Arro

customer_reviews.title: I like my new radio a lot
customer_reviews.text: I like my new radio a lot. One thing I would like to see is if the display was darker it is a little hard to see. The on screen controls are hard to get use to, but maybe thats because I am 70 years old, and my hand shakes a little. Over all I like every thing about the radio and nav, movies play good also.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph E Wienecke Jr

customer_reviews.title: sound's better than my factory radio
customer_reviews.text: Bought one and definitely changed how my car looks ,sound's better than my factory radio , back up camera works great ,still to try the GPS but would certainly recommend this to anyone
customer_reviews.author: Anthony muisyo

customer_reviews.title: Boss auto system
customer_reviews.text: Good radio and nav. but the radio keep jumping station that the bad i found about it but a very good deal and will not buy again
customer_reviews.author: vernon wilson

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: This works well. EQ is easy to use, easy install instructions, touch screen works well. Camera cord could have been longer!
customer_reviews.author: Ian

customer_reviews.title: Do Not Buy!!!!
customer_reviews.text: After buying this item it started out fine. Besides the gps didn’t work it would get you lost! But the sound quality was good.. I have only had it right at 6 months and this unit has just died will not do anything at all it did this once after about the 3rd moth of having it but came back on after awhile now it has completely crashed. I want my money back! This was professionally installed. Do Not Buy!
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: For best performance also install front and rear amps
customer_reviews.text: I added the back up cam and it was easy and works great. My wife really appreciates it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Happy
customer_reviews.text: I loved modernizing my bus Ford Edge sel 2008. Although I had to buy other things so that the installation was perfect. At one point I was scared that he didn't turn me on but when I took him to the expert who installed it, it was that he had disconnected it, it connected and it worked great and I was happy
customer_reviews.author: Jenny

customer_reviews.title: Works great.
customer_reviews.text: Great unit, navi is a lil slow and when u shut it down it defaults back to the radio instead of bluetooth
customer_reviews.author: Wes Russell

customer_reviews.title: Easy to go from stations to Bluetooth. Easy to pair
customer_reviews.text: Love the touch screen. Back up camera and screen are great. Going to add a sub & amp now.
customer_reviews.author: William Rusk

customer_reviews.title: No navigation updates !!!
customer_reviews.text: Radio is fair quality for the price. BUT,,,tried to update navigation,,,, after taking my $28 came back with no updates available,, no refund. Avoid like the plague,,
customer_reviews.author: Zapdog

customer_reviews.title: this is a nice unit had to call Customer Services to ask a ...
customer_reviews.text: this is a nice unit had to call Customer Services to ask a Q could help thay well not get a J.D power award i know i well not geiv them one
customer_reviews.author: Daffy

customer_reviews.title: Wish I knew it does not support PAC Adapter kits
customer_reviews.text: It does not support PAC adapter kits so my steering wheel controls no longer work. I decided to keep it because it still looks nice.
customer_reviews.author: Geno

customer_reviews.title: Get the backup camera,  pretty good to have if your windows are tinted dark like mine.
customer_reviews.text: Pretty decent unit, perfect for the suv, puts out plenty of power to the speakers. Sounds great with full range eq. The navigation is a pain to use. I’ve tried to update it and everything else. But the maps suck. It takes you in the worst direction, and you can’t tell where your going from looking at the screen.
customer_reviews.author: JasonThomasBowers1358

customer_reviews.title: Lots of features, mediocre sound,GPS terrible
customer_reviews.text: basic sound, navigation is awful , other features are good
customer_reviews.author: Rodney Danford

customer_reviews.title: I like everything. Radio excellent
customer_reviews.text: I like everything. Radio excellent, phone picks right up, streaming Bluetooth music excellent, GPS/NAVIGATION works the only thing i have not tried is camera but i would guess it will work also.
customer_reviews.author: Tony

customer_reviews.title: I'm looking for another one with SD
customer_reviews.text: It's a great stereo you can see movies on the road. I love the SD card you can put hundreds of songs. Why? Are they not putting sd card systems any more? I'll be looking for another one
customer_reviews.author: David T.

customer_reviews.title: Worst pos stereo I ever had
customer_reviews.text: Nothing works right, laughable navigation system. Only thing that didn't suck was the FM radio. Run away from this one and don't look back. I sucked it up and bought an android China head unit that is a 5 star setup.
customer_reviews.author: Shane

customer_reviews.title: great stereo
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't able to figure out the navigation system but I did not care since I normally use my cell for that. The sound was really good. Bluetooth worked great. Streaming from my phone was really easy. The dvd was also awesome. I would buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Estela Villasenor

customer_reviews.title: dont trust it will fix after it says it will
customer_reviews.text: said it fix my 2006 audi 8a so why is it sticking out 3 inches and cost me 200 to get it installed
customer_reviews.author: Gift Card Buyer

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed
customer_reviews.text: Get what ya pay for. Dvd player stopped working, rear view camera stopped working with it, blue tooth is hit or miss , have to reset it frequently, navigation is good. Touch screen is good.
customer_reviews.author: B. Collins

customer_reviews.title: Fm crackles in and out
customer_reviews.text: Radio crackles and doesn’t get good radio signal. They make you pay for shipping when returned and restocking fee. Don’t buy
customer_reviews.author: Neil Doakley

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: For the price it really is a pretty nice addition.Bought It for in my 2004 Dodge Ram 3500. I haven't had a chance to use it much yet but so far I really like it.
customer_reviews.author: dpatrick

customer_reviews.title: User friendly and back up camera is amazing
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this just over a month ago. So far so good. The back up camera works amazing. It's clear as can be day and night. The radio is easy to use and bluetooth connect.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Dennis

customer_reviews.title: Arrived on time
customer_reviews.text: I have only had it installed for less than a day. I will need to go somewhere to see how everything works. If all is well I will change my review rating.
customer_reviews.author: Tony

customer_reviews.title: Not happy with it!
customer_reviews.text: Since installing the radio I have had intermittent problems. I wish I would have left my stockradio as it was. One thing I noticed I don’t have anymore. I no longer know what the outdoor temperature is for that day. I didn’t think about it until now that it’s gone. It’s way too much to list the cons of this radio. I am not happy with it all in all.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Gibson

customer_reviews.title: Great after market radio
customer_reviews.text: Great fit after some minor modifications, operates perfect, self installed and the customer support team is quick and responsive.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Better units for the price
customer_reviews.text: DVD playback and backup camera work intermittently. Connectivity is non existent when it comes to text messages and text to talk. Install was smooth. Haven’t had any issues with voice calls like others have. GPS is dated and useless
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: The directions included were difficult to follow, parts were missing and had to wait for them to arrive before finishing the job and there is no sound alarm to warn when the vehicle is to close when backing up.
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn Zanin

customer_reviews.title: Not a good buy
customer_reviews.text: Received wrong radio in box. Doesn’t have remote or navigation.
customer_reviews.author: Robert TQ

customer_reviews.title: Perfect auto stereo with all the buttons!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love it, all I need for travel, and enjoyment, awesome product! Thank you!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jerome D. Romero

customer_reviews.title: Audio system
customer_reviews.text: I love this Audio system. The only thing that I don’t like is the maps systems. It rather confusing when you are looking for addresses
customer_reviews.author: Andelmo Aponte

customer_reviews.title: Junk, spent more time turned off to avoid problems
customer_reviews.text: Erratically changes inputs. When the issue starts (which is pretty often) it will continue to cycle through inputs very quickly until the unit is powered down, 50/50 shot of turning it back on and immediately cycling inputs again.
customer_reviews.author: Keith Burlette

customer_reviews.title: Cheap and broken
customer_reviews.text: After just 3 months the radio stopped working. I took it out to check what was wrong and the screen had become detached from the unit. You can see the plastic piecws that hold the unit to the screen are broken. Holy s*** so cheaply made and juat 3 months old.
customer_reviews.author: Mitchell W.

customer_reviews.title: map/directions not very good.
customer_reviews.text: Direction app tells you to make illegal uturns and go down one way streets the wrong way.. Had to have Best Buy install as no clear instructions on how to install all add ons (back up camera)
customer_reviews.author: Scott Robar

customer_reviews.title: off the charts
customer_reviews.text: Amazing And completely sounds amazing the back up camera is awesome the sound quality will blow your
customer_reviews.author: johnny larance

product_meta.title: BOSS Audio Systems BVNV9384RC Car GPS Navigation and DVD Player - Double Din, Bluetooth Audio and Calling, 6.2 Inch LCD Touchscreen Monitor, MP3 CD DVD USB SD, Aux-in, AM FM Radio Receiver
product_meta.description: Style:Navigation With Rear CameraMap out your next journey and enjoy your music playlists on the go with the BOSS Audio BVNV9384RC Double-DIN DVD Player with built-in GPS Navigation capability on a 6.2-inch Touchscreen Monitor. Enjoy map coverage of all 50 US States and Puerto Rico and pre-loaded points-of-interest while listening to your favorite music on the DVD/CD Player. Tune into the AM/FM radio, hook your Smartphone or MP3 Player up to the Auxiliary Input, or plug into the USB and SD ports to listen to your music with High Resolution Audio. Bluetooth technology lets you play and control music apps like Pandora and Spotify and make calls hands-free. Change up the sound style with the built-in Preset EQ. Control it all with the Wireless Remote, existing Steering Wheel Controls (interface sold separately), and Touchscreen. Use the Rear Camera to ensure you back up safely on your next trip. Shift your music into high gear with the Boss Audio BVNV9384RC. For further product details, please scroll down. The device is suitable for 12V power supply
feature_bullets: GPS NAVIGATION: Built-in GPS (Global Positioning System) includes coverage of all 50 states, Puerto Rico and pre-loaded point of interest. The text-to-speech allows for an audible prompt, guiding to your final destination. View maps in 2D as well as 3D

BLUETOOTH: Answer calls with just one push of a button. Make calls and be hands-free with no distractions. No need to hold your phone ever again. You can also play and control your music and apps like Spotify / Pandora wirelessly

MEDIA PLAYBACK: Watch your choice of videos through the DVD player, play music through your Bluetooth device, pop in a CD or use the USB and SD ports for more audio alternatives. Tune into the AM / FM radio stations for up to date music/news/sports and more
AUXILIARY INPUT: This double din head unit is compatible with the audio output from smartphones as well as MP3 players. Even more ways to chill

INPUTS: USB / SD, AUX input. Connect the included rearview camera and backup safely. The steering wheel interface allows you to use the existing functions on your steering wheel (interface module sold separately. We recommend the metra ASWC-1)

OUTPUTS: Use the front, rear & subwoofer pre-amp outputs to hook up your speakers (front left / front right and rear left / rear right) and subwoofer. The video output allows you to connect an extra screen for more viewing capability
POWER: You can get 80 watts x 4 Max power from the BVNV9384RC to power your speakers. An amplifier is recommended to make sure your speakers are well powered

WARRANTY: BOSS Audio Systems provides a powerful 3-year platinum online dealer warranty so long as the purchase ss made through Amazon.com. We strongly encourage professional installation of this product to ensure proper and safe functionality

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.9 out of 5 stars848 ratings3.9 out of 5 stars
